job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer - React/C#
job.description:
If you are a react/C# developer looking for a small, close knit team where you can work remoote, please read on!

Top Reasons to Work with Us
  • Competitive pay, top-tier benefits, and unlimited PTO
  • People first environment with great office perks
  • 401k Matching!
What You Will Be Doing

Full-stack software development
Working closely with the engineering team, QA, and product users on a highly functional agile team
Leading and guiding a team of junior and mid-level developers and test engineers
Ensuring system health and fixing defects
Solving difficult problems through research and innovation

What You Need for this Position

At Least 3 Years Of Experience And Knowledge Of
  • .NET
  • C#
  • JavaScript
  • REACT
  • Azure
  • Cloud
What's In It for You
  • Competitive pay, top-tier benefits, and unlimited PTO
  • People first environment with great office/wfh perks
  • 401k Matching!
So if you are a software engineer with the above experience, please apply today or email me directly at danny.gross@cybercoders.com.

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Danny.Gross@CyberCoders.com
  • Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : DG7-1641170 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Danny Gross - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
